an5.21:4.1: “Mendicants, it’s simply impossible that a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with incompatible lifestyle could fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.21:4.2: Without fulfilling the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s impossible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.21:4.3: Without fulfilling the practice of a trainee, it’s impossible to fulfill ethics.
an5.21:4.4: Without fulfilling ethics, it’s impossible to fulfill right view.
an5.21:4.5: Without fulfilling right view, it’s impossible to fulfill right samādhi.
an5.21:5.1: But it is possible that a respectful and reverent mendicant with compatible lifestyle could fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.
an5.21:5.2: Having fulfilled the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s possible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an5.21:5.3: Having fulfilled the practice of a trainee, it’s possible to fulfill ethics.
an5.21:5.4: Having fulfilled ethics, it’s possible to fulfill right view.
an5.21:5.5: Having fulfilled right view, it’s possible to fulfill right samādhi.”
